name: api-rate-limiter-microservices
description: Microservices-based API Rate Limiter with Token Bucket Algorithm
author: unais-08

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "ADMIN,GATEWAY,RATELIMIT,ANALYTICS,BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "bgBlue,bgMagenta,bgCyan,bgGreen,bgYellow,bgRed" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:ratelimiter" "npm run dev:analytics" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd rate-limit-microservices/admin-service && npm install && cd ../api-gateway-service && npm install && cd ../rate-limiter-service && npm install && cd ../usage-analytics-service && npm install && cd ../../backend-service && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:admin && npm run build:gateway && npm run build:ratelimiter && npm run build:analytics && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.prisma:studio: concurrently -n "ADMIN-DB,ANALYTICS-DB" -c "bgBlue,bgGreen" "cd rate-limit-microservices/admin-service && npx prisma studio --port 5555" "cd rate-limit-microservices/usage-analytics-service && npx prisma studio --port 5556"
